Hi there!

My name is Christina, my passion is Solo travel and making connections with the people you meet along the way. I hope to inspire you to take an adventure out of your comfort zone because that's where you discover true happiness! Find out more HERE

Recent Adventures

It's never too late to learn

This year I attended two courses abroad in Bali at the Institute of Code. The first one was Web Development in June and with no previous coding experience I walked away with this website! Custom built by myself in just 10 days! Amazing!! The Second course I did was Social Media and content marketing in November and this course gave my the confidence and push to follow my dreams of living life as a digital nomad and hopefully an influencer. To read more on these course and my time in Bali click HERE.
